name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. William GRIBBLE, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. William GRIBBLE, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 27th day of March, 1998, upon consideration of petitioner’s emergency motion for a stay of execution, and the Commonwealth’s concurrence with this application, IT IS HEREBY ORDERED that petitioner’s application is GRANTED and his execution will be stayed pending action by the United States Supreme Court on his petition for writ of certiorari from this Court’s ruling in Commonwealth v. Gribble, — Pa. -, 703 A.2d 426 (1997).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

casebody.head_matter:
707 A.2d 510
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. William GRIBBLE, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 27, 1998.
